description:
Tree Works Application in Highgate Hill / Hornsey Lane Conservation Area, Netherleigh Close, Islington London N6 5LL

A tree Works Application has been received to do the following tree works at the above address:

 Ivy- at the wall
-	Sever at the base, wait until the above Ivy has died- then remove the dried in Ivy, as this is the best way of removing Ivy from walls.
Mulberry
-	Crown thin by no more than 20-30% remove deadwood in crown and prune away from the property leaving a clearance of 2 metres to the building.
Oak
-	 Crown thin by no more than 15% remove deadwood in crown and prune away from the property leaving a clearance of 2 metres to the building. 

Ash
-	Crown thin by no more than 20% remove deadwood in crown and prune away from the property leaving a clearance of 2 metres to the building.
decision_conditions: The specification has been changed in agreement with the Contractor.
